text.section: If a partner's dissociation results in a dissolution and winding up of the partnership business, then KRS 362.1-801 to 362.1-807 apply; otherwise, KRS 362.1-701 to 362.1-705 apply.

Upon a partner's dissociation, the dissociating partner's:
Right to participate in the management and conduct of the partnership business terminates, except as otherwise provided in KRS 362.1-803;
Duty of loyalty under KRS 362.1-404(2)(c) terminates; and
Duty of loyalty under KRS 362.1-404(2)(a) and (b) and duty of care under KRS 362.1-404(3) continue only with regard to matters arising and events occurring before the partner's dissociation, unless the partner participates in winding up the partnership's business pursuant to KRS 362.1-803.

law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 48, effective July 12, 2006.
